item.description:
Tortilla Flats, on Hope St. on Providence's East Side is going to be the scene of the 1st 2009 Providence Chapter of the NE Organizers Meetup. A fun place with wonderful Margheritas, and a variety of fresh Mexican food, 'the Flats' is a perfect setting for our get together.


We'll use the time to get to know one another and to discuss not only the role of the organizer (and related war stories) but the direction of the group as well.

While this is open to all organizers, it's really a meeting focused on the Providence-area chapter of NE Meetup Organizers, which will be our focus.

Hope to see you there!
item.name: NE Organizers Winter Meetup - Providence Chapter
